title: Stormbringer
description: The epic tale of Elric of Melnibon√©, albino prince of ruins, moves to its awesome conclusion - with the whole of the natural and supernatural world in mighty conflict - the final conflict, Armageddon. Elric holds the key to the future: the new age which must follow the destruction. To turn that key he must sacrifice all that he loves and risk his very soul.Fixup of the following novellas:Sad Giant's Shield (1964)Doomed Lord's Passing (1964)Dead God's Homecoming (1963)Black Sword's Brothers (1963)
author: Michael Moorcock
